items.title: Where are wall profiles used?
items.description: Wall profiles are a product suitable for many living spaces, whether home or office. You can use wall profiles in cafes, restaurants, offices and homes.
items.content:
Wall profiles are a product suitable for many living spaces, whether home or office. You can use wall profiles in cafes, restaurants, offices and homes. It is among the products preferred by everyone because it is quick and easy to make wall profiles. Wall profiles, which add aesthetics to the environment where they are applied, cause your living spaces and spaces to take on a different atmosphere.

Wall panels, at the entrances of the place; It makes a difference in living room, bedroom and even all rooms. It transforms the area into a stylish look, especially by using it in the empty areas of the house.

To give a special example; Covering the wall completely or halfway in the coffee corners in the kitchen can take its place in your home as a nice detail.

You can make choices according to your own tastes with the color, texture and surface options on the wall panels.

Wall panels, which are the most preferred product by architects recently, have the feature of completely changing the atmosphere of your environment by being applied behind the bed in the bedroom, behind the television unit in the living room or on another blank wall.

Moreover, you do not need to have every part of your house done to achieve this completely different look. One wall, one area can be enough to realize the elegance that wall panels create in your home.

It has the feature of completely changing the atmosphere of the environment you are in, by being applied to the back of the television unit or another blank wall in the living room.

items.title: Can wall profiles be used outdoors?
items.description: Although wall profiles are used indoors, they are not suitable for outdoors. Since the material is wood, it will be healthy to use indoors.
items.content: Although wall profiles are used indoors, they are not suitable for outdoors. Since the material is wood, it will be healthy to use indoors. If it is used outdoors, it will lose its stylish appearance as it will be exposed to sun rays, rain water and many other external factors.

items.title: How to install wall profiles? Is a master required in the assembly of wall profiles?
items.description: The application of wall profiles is preferred because it is fast. Applying the wall profiles in the fastest and most accurate way together with the assembly masters yields healthier results.
items.content:
The application of wall profiles is preferred because it is fast. Applying the wall profiles in the fastest and most accurate way together with the assembly masters yields healthier results. However, you can also apply your wall profiles with videos that you can watch on our website and social media accounts.

We can give you explanatory information about applying wall profiles apart from the videos.

The floor is checked before mounting the wall profiles. A detailed measurement is required. Then, the skeleton of the area where the wall profiles will be mounted is created with the help of a drill. This skeleton must be at intervals of 40 centimeters.

Then, the wall profiles in their packaging are removed with great care. The assembly starts with the help of a drill.

The installation of wall profiles is done with great patience and finished.
